headline.print_headline: Newspaper Investigation Questions Oil Field Safety
headline.main: Newspaper Investigation Questions Oil Field Safety

lead_paragraph: Injury claims, government data and public records of oil field accidents since the start of the onshore drilling and fracking boom in 2007 show the federal government failed to implement safety standards and procedures, according to a Houston Chronicle investigation.
